steps: step 2: Login at Page_login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_team_project --> navigate to Page_project
step 4: At Page_project click on hyperlink_team_project_settings --> navigate to Page_settings
step 5: At Page_settings click on hyperlink_team_project_custom_fields --> navigate to Page_custom-fields
step 6: At Page_custom-fields click on button_select_organization
step 7: Add visual checkpoint at Page_custom-fields
